qa.name: Ancient Oak
qa.appearance: Massive tree with gnarled bark and sprawling branches

json_to_edit.voice_over: Through millennia, I have witnessed the ascent of humanity.
json_to_edit.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, birds chirping, distant human activities
json_to_edit.name: Timeless Observer
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree witnesses key moments in human evolution.

qa.action: The ancient oak stands tall in a forest clearing, surrounded by nature.

hf.action: A Neanderthal examines the oak's bark, fascinated by its texture.

tr.action: Time-lapse showing the changing seasons around the oak tree.

xc.action: A Renaissance artist sketches the oak tree, capturing its majesty.

ka.action: The modern scientist takes notes while observing the oak's growth rings.

fn.action: The oak tree now stands at the edge of a modern city, a silent witness to progress.

af.action: The oak's gnarled bark, showing the passage of time through its intricate patterns.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 3, 1, 5, 2, 7, 4, 6. Don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: Through millennia, I have witnessed the ascent of humanity.
updated_json.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, birds chirping, distant human activities
updated_json.name: Timeless Observer
updated_json.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree witnesses key moments in human evolution.

qa.action: The ancient oak stands tall in a forest clearing, surrounded by nature.

hf.action: A Neanderthal examines the oak's bark, fascinated by its texture.

tr.action: Time-lapse showing the changing seasons around the oak tree.

xc.action: A Renaissance artist sketches the oak tree, capturing its majesty.

ka.action: The modern scientist takes notes while observing the oak's growth rings.

fn.action: The oak tree now stands at the edge of a modern city, a silent witness to progress.

af.action: The oak's gnarled bark, showing the passage of time through its intricate patterns.

label.rationale:
we need to rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director without changing any other content in the scene. the current order of shots is represented by the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object. we'll update this order according to the new sequence: 3, 1, 5, 2, 7, 4, 6. here's how we'll map the new order to the existing shot keys:

3 (time-lapse) -> tr
1 (ancient oak stands tall) -> qa
5 (modern scientist takes notes) -> ka
2 (neanderthal examines bark) -> hf
7 (extreme close-up of bark) -> af
4 (renaissance artist sketches) -> xc
6 (oak at edge of modern city) -> fn

we'll update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to reflect this new sequence. no other changes will be made to the scene or shot contents.
